# Parser.FollowedBy&lt;T,U&gt; method

Succeeds if the specified parser also succeeds afterward (ignoring its result).

```csharp
public static IParser<T> FollowedBy<T, U>(this IParser<T> parser, IParser<U> followedBy)
```
